import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Navbar , Nav, Container, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' const Header = () => { const userLogin = useSelector(state=> state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin return (
Proshop
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile ) : Sign In }
) } export default Header
